entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
